alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 7:01PM CST until February 26 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Marengo Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 101.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 92.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning to a crest of 101.0 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
